long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reduce eye strain by using this program to take a break from your screen. Use the button to start the timer and after 20 minutes, you will be reminded to take a 20 second break from your screen by looking at something 20 feet or 6 meters away from you.

For digital wellbeing, you should take a break from your screen every 20 minutes, by looking at something 20 feet or 6 meters away for 20 seconds. I built this extension because I was getting eye strain when using my computer.

Join other users like you looking to improve their productivity and eye health.

Version 1.1:
You will get a notification sent to your desktop when time is up.


For any bug or feature requests, please email me at nicholasm.marie@gmail.com
